transcribedText: Hello, hello, one, two, two, two.

slides.title: Introduction
slides.speakerNotes: Start by greeting the audience and ensuring everyone can hear the presentation clearly.

slides.title: Test Phrase Analysis
slides.content: Reiteration of simple words for microphone check.
slides.speakerNotes: Explain the importance of clear audio in presentations and why phrases like 'hello, hello, one, two, two, two' are used for testing equipment.

slides.title: Importance of Clear Communication
slides.content: Clear audio ensures effective message delivery.
slides.speakerNotes: Discuss how clarity in communication is key to the success of presenting, ensuring no one misses critical information.

slides.title: Engagement with Audience
slides.content: Engage the audience by confirming they hear you clearly.
slides.speakerNotes: Encourage interaction by asking the audience to respond or signal if they encounter any audio issues, creating a more engaged environment.

slides.title: Conclusion
slides.content: Ready to progress into the core presentation topics.
slides.speakerNotes: Conclude the audio check portion of the presentation, ensuring readiness to move to the next segments of your talk.
